import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import {Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import ProgressBar from "../../components/ProgressBar"; import Tours from '../../DB/Tuscany.json'; import { setIncrease } from "../../slices/counterSlice"; export default function BookingDetails() { const {id} = useParams(); return ( <>
